name: FeatherSorrow
description:
Looking for feedback on our school project. Please write a comment after playing about your thoughts on the game, thanks :)

Description:

FeatherSorrow is about making your way out of the caves to the city and then to the temple where you find a way out of the city and break free. 

Controls:

Move - arrows, wasd, left joystick

Jump - z, space bar, gamepad button south

Attack - x, k, gamepad button west

Throw - c, j, gamepad button east

Navigate menu - arrows, wasd, dpad

Choose menu option - z, enter, gamepad button south
